Trustee_3_pre_1.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3_pre_1.content: I demonstrated transparency and fairness throughout the investment process, proposing an equitable profit-sharing structure that prioritized my investor's gains. My successful investment outcomes and commitment to mutual prosperity enhance my reputation as a compassionate and responsible trustee. I am perceived as highly trustworthy and pro-social, having effectively adhered to social norms and engaged positively with the investor.
